description: Search your Flashback video library with natural language to instantly find relevant moments. Get detailed descriptions and secure, time-limited links to 30-second clips ranked by relevance. Start quickly with a simple setup and built-in guidance.

user_id.description: Your Flashback account user ID - this identifies your video collection

capabilities.name: query_videos
capabilities.description: Search for video clips based on natural language query. Returns detailed AI-generated descriptions and URLs of relevant video segments.

capabilities.name: get_setup_instructions
capabilities.description: Get instructions for setting up the video query system
